name: Ode to Otto Dix - 2021
description: This NFT using Otto Dix as a main object. I really inspired him as an  art student in printmaking studio, in the college year. As an Outstanding illustrator, Otto Dix has left us 500 sketches and various portraits, as well as canvases and watercolors, which undoubtedly evoke the Renaissance era. It's special artwork to celebrate 500K artwork that has minted in HEN. 1700 x 2266 pixel. GIF. 500 edition.
